How to Clean Countertops
Cleaning and disinfecting countertops is key to maintaining a healthy home. Learn how to safely remove greasy food stains and kill germs on your kitchen counters, with or without bleach.
More from Clorox experts
By
Mary Gagliardi
Discover more ways to clean.
Use as directed.
It’s hard to top the germ-killing power of bleach to disinfect surfaces like kitchen counters, but there is a great bleach-free alternative. Our Free & Clear products are formulated without dyes, bleach or ammonia, and they’re safe around food,* so you can confidently eliminate greasy stains and disinfect surfaces in your kitchen, no rinse required.

Steps to disinfect kitchen counters with bleach
Clear the counter
Set aside canisters, countertop appliances and anything else taking up space on the counter.
Pre-clean the counter
If needed, use a paper towel dampened with water to wipe any obvious crumbs or grime off the counter before the disinfecting step.
Prepare the disinfecting bleach and water solution
Measure 1 gallon of water (16 cups) into the plastic dishpan, and then add 1/3 cup bleach to the water.
Apply the disinfecting bleach solution
While wearing gloves, use the sponge to apply the bleach and water solution to the counter until it is completely wet. Reapply the solution as needed to keep the counter wet for 6 minutes.
Tip
Counter must remain wet for 6 minutes to disinfect.
Rinse
Thoroughly rinse away the bleach solution with clean water.
Air dry
Allow the countertop to air dry completely before replacing appliances and canisters.

Steps to disinfect countertops with Free & Clear
Clear the counter
Set aside canisters, countertop appliances and anything else taking up space on the counter.
Pre-clean the counter
If needed, wipe away obvious dirt or grime from the countertop with Clorox® Free & Clear Compostable Cleaning Wipes before the disinfecting step. Or spray with Clorox® Free and Clear Multi-Surface Spray Cleaner and wipe clean with a paper towel before disinfecting.
Tip
No rinsing is required after cleaning with Free & Clear cleaning products.
Disinfect
Hold Clorox® Free & Clear Disinfecting Mist 6-8 inches from the surface of the counter and spray until thoroughly wet.
Tip
Surface must remain visibly wet for 2 minutes to disinfect.
Air dry
No rinsing is required. Allow the countertop to air dry completely before replacing canisters and appliances.
*
When used as directed.

An important safety message
Bleach and other disinfectants are not suitable for consumption or injection under any circumstances. People should always read the label for proper usage instructions. Disinfecting surfaces with bleach and the disinfecting products is one of the ways to help stop the spread of COVID-19, according to the Centers for Disease Control. Our products are safe when used as directed. It’s critical that everyone understands the facts in order to keep themselves safe and healthy.
